recipe.title: Maple Pecan Popcorn
ingredients: 1 cup pecans (3 1/2 oz), toasted and coarsely chopped
instructions: Toss together pecans and popcorn in a large bowl. Line a large shallow baking pan with foil, then lightly oil foil and a wooden spoon. Melt butter in a 1- to 1 1/2-quart heavy saucepan over moderate heat. Add syrup and salt, then boil, without stirring, until mixture registers 300°F on thermometer, 15 to 20 minutes. Pour syrup over pecans and popcorn, stirring briskly with oiled spoon to coat. Immediately spread popcorn in baking pan. Cool completely, then break into bite-size pieces.
